view.home.hero.p: A FAN PROJECT for the game Aliya: Timelink
view.home.h2.1: Trying to Dig Into the Game
view.home.1.1: With my love<sup>[ref2]</sup> for Aliya's story, I decided to create a small project
view.home.1.card.1.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Full Story Flowcharts
view.home.1.card.1.subtitle: The most detailed one, probably.
view.home.1.card.1.content: Based on the reverse engineering of Fungus Block and Custom Commands, Aliya DB made it possible to parser the in-game story flowcharts even outside the game, and also visualize them on the website.
view.home.1.card.2.title: üåê L10N Text Query/Look Up
view.home.1.card.2.subtitle: Complete database for dialogues and choices.
view.home.1.card.2.content: An JSON-based L10N database, with full support for global, full-text search & filtering.
view.home.1.card.3.title: ‚ùì More Coming Soon...
view.home.1.card.3.subtitle: Perhaps, if it doesn't get taken down.
view.home.1.card.3.content:
I honestly have no idea what to put here, like the reason why I'm even building this project is just my pure curiosity for the story, and so a parsing script and a site for visualization are created, that's it.
But I also think that 2 cards are ugly for layout, so this one doesn't have anything special - to be frank, I don't even know what's worth further development other than the story flowcharts, which I took genuine interest in.
view.home.1.2: *Part of the data and code are open-source on GitHub. You can learn more at our TECHNICAL EXPLANATION document.
view.home.2.2: I'm bored and I like Aliya
view.home.2.3: It was actually a simple story for me to meet Aliya: I just wanted to make up an order to get a 2025 Summer Sale card <spolier title="You know too much lol">(though it went expired and I was never able to sell it lol)</spolier>. At that time I was almost close to that 71 yuan (10 USD) mark, and so I started looking for some small, cheap indie games to pad the order; given that I suck at FPS games and the fact that I'd like to dip my toes into VNs, I began rummagging through Steam for games with relevant tags. And soon enough, I discovered Aliya.
view.home.2.4: With the mindset of "small games are easier to try out," I started playing Aliya for the first time on the morning of July 10, 2025, and finished the first ending that same night. To be frank, while Aliya's story is still a bit cliche in parts (like the corporate exploitation trope), it was still surprisingly touching, especially towards the end when the real Aliya has been, in fact, passed away (fuck Tayris, FUCKING JUST go to the hell ALREADY), and Aliya's rational yet emotional sweet talk that "Right now, I might be looking at you as you are". All of these elevated the game to a height that I wasn't really expecting for, and I should say that Aliya's story is genuinely captivating to me, so much so that I ended up buying two copies for my two friends out of my pocket, just so they can have a taste on the game as soon as possible - Good games needs to be enjoyed.
view.home.2.5: As for parsing the story flowcharts, well, it's more like an accident. At the very beginning I was just very curious about English localization quality (according to an English review on Jan 2025, the game's localization sucks, with some parts clearly having some grammar issues), but after extracting it I found it to be actually quite high-quality, and so I became bored and started digging into other stuff where, in the process, I stumbled upon what appears to be story text. From there, I went all-in and pulled out all the flowcharts (or more accurately, the flowchart prefab files generated by Fungus) and began parsing and visualizing them. You can read the technical explanation document mentioned above to learn more about it.
view.home.2.6: Anyways, thank you for reading this! I do quite love Aliya's story, which is why I spent about one week working on this little project to visualize the story's execution logic. Hopefully you'll like it!
view.home.2.7: Lastly, I suck at doing front-end work, so the UI/UX for this website is probably very rough, but
view.home.3.1: Play it already! OR SPOLIER ALERT!
view.home.3.2:
Steam Store - Aliya: Timelink [2704110]
Only 3 bucks, why not try?
view.flowchart.p.loading2: If the page is loading too long (over 15s), it's possible that the data loading has failed silently. Please check your Internet connection, then refresh this page.
comp.flowchart.p.view2: Select a flowchart to view its content
comp.flowchart.p.view3: TIP: You can click the setting button on the top right to customize your name and L10N language.
comp.flowchart.p.view4: WARNING: It is highly UNRECOMMANDED to change L10N language after the flowchart is loaded, for the fact that it would make flowcharts to mis-layout. In order to resolve this, you'll need to likely force it to re-layout (click the last button on the top left of the flowchart) or re-enter/refresh the page.
comp.flowchart.p.view5: TIP: In the event of an mis-layout, you can click the last button on the top left of the flowchart to force a re-layouting.
comp.flowchart.p.view6: TIP: Got something you don't really understand? Check the FAQ page first (you can enter by navigating to our top navmanu.)
comp.flowchartmetadata.name: Flowchart Name
comp.footer.p.1: It's recommended to visit this website in Desktop and with Google Chrome or other modern browsers. Mobile users may experience lagging.

view.l10n.p.2: Select one and more L10N lang
view.l10n.p.5: Or download raw JSON data for each language

comp.spolier.title: You know too much lol
comp.setting.showformatted.p1: I.e. whether to replace the player's name, years, etc. that appeared in the dialogue with actual content.

comp.flowchart.node.FlowchartStart.title: Flowchart Start
comp.flowchart.node.FlowchartBlock.title: Flowchart
comp.flowchart.node.EndIf.title: End If
comp.flowchart.node.Else.title: Else
comp.flowchart.node.DefaultChoice.title: (Auto) Default Choice
A "choice" that has higher priority. It'll wait for a specific time after the last command, and if no other choice is made during that time, it'll be triggered and skip to the target block.
comp.flowchart.node.CallBlock.title: Jump to Target Block
comp.flowchart.node.GroupBlock.title: Group Block
comp.flowchart.node.GroupBlock.p.name: Group name
comp.flowchart.node.SetHeartRate.title: Set Heartrate Base Value
comp.flowchart.node.CallFlowchart.title: Jump to Target Flowchart
comp.flowchart.node.WaitTime.title: Wait Time
comp.flowchart.node.Then.title: Then
comp.flowchart.node.WaitPreciseTime.titl: This command will only be run at a specific time spot, the spot matching your actual system time.
comp.flowchart.node.WaitPreciseTime.p.ne: Wait until at least next day
comp.flowchart.node.WaitPreciseTime.p.is: Is the first Wait Specific Time block
comp.flowchart.node.GetAchievement.title: Get Achievement
comp.flowchart.node.SetVariable.title: Set Variable
comp.flowchart.node.DefineVariable.title: Define Variable
comp.flowchart.node.SetRadioValue.title: Set Radio State
comp.flowchart.node.CallDailyPart.title: Skip to Daily
comp.flowchart.node.ChangeBGMusic.title: Change BGM
comp.flowchart.node.ClampO2Res.title: Clamp O2 Resource
comp.flowchart.node.ClampWaterRes.title: Clamp Water Resource
comp.flowchart.node.AliyaMessage.title: Aliya's Message
comp.flowchart.node.AliyaMessage.p.autow: i.e. do not specify a time but to calculate automatically based on the length of a message
comp.flowchart.node.AliyaMessage.p.waits: When "Auto calculate waitint time" is false, use the value here as the waiting time
comp.flowchart.node.AliyaMessage.p.image: When Image ID isn't null, send the image as the actual message body
comp.flowchart.node.PlayerChoice.title: Player's Choice
i.e. the text displayed as a choice/selection, due to the fact that in some cases, the choice's text may differ from the text to be sent to include extra tips/clues
comp.flowchart.node.PlayerInput.title: Player Input
comp.flowchart.node.If.title: If
comp.flowchart.node.If.p.anyorallconditi: An "overall condition" is a condition that decides the result to be true or false when multiple conditions (condition group) exist. It defines the requirements that all these conditions need to meet in order to produce an "overall" result.
comp.flowchart.node.SetENGRes.title: Fuel Reduction Parameters
comp.flowchart.node.SetEHValue.title: Set EH State
comp.flowchart.node.RestartGame.title: Trigger Save Reset
comp.flowchart.node.ConfigSpecialEnd.p.o: Flowchart name when O2 runs out
comp.flowchart.node.ActivateEH.title: Activate EH Control
comp.flowchart.node.ActivateEOG.title: Activate EOG Control
comp.flowchart.node.ActivateRadio.title: Activate Radio Control
comp.flowchart.node.BanEHControl.title: Ban EH Control
